short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always know how long you have until your next Due date

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes the most important thing to know is what task needs to be done first.
This depends on its due date. Simply add a task name, whether it be an online class
whose next due date is approaching, a chore, a shift about to start, whatever!

Add the task name, a helpful link to the task (if its something that can be done online), then all you'll have to do is update the due date for the task and this
extension will keep you aware of how long you have until the next due date. 

Maybe your next due date is something you know you can finish in an hour and you are more worried about the paper due in a few days. Disable tasks with sooner due dates to get a feel for how long you have until the paper is due.
